snippet.title: ASTRAL GUARD - Mother Direct 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
https://twitter.com/AstralGuardGame
https://punkitt.itch.io/astralguard


✨Welcome to the Crew! ✨

Astral Guard is an interplanetary RPG adventure following a group of aliens to stop a vicious hivemind from taking over the solar system. Find friends, fight foes, and travel the stars! 💫

The game follows Axis, a Lin from the planet Felo who's always dreamed of leaving his home and exploring the stars. He always figured it was just a dream that he'd let go of eventually...until one fateful night when he's visited by the last member of the Astral Guard in desperate need of help...


----------------------------------------------------------


I can't believe I had to keep this under wraps for so long!!! Still, I am so so so SO proud of how this turned out. Big big shoutouts to Eric, AG's new composer, for making such a wonderful tune. This was a joy to work on, even if it was a bit exhausting at times! I really wanted to push myself after last year's trailer; showing gameplay, animation, new tunes, the works!! I wanted to outdo last year and really get people on board for the project. So far, it's succeeded!! Thank you all so much for the support, it means a ton to me. I'm gonna go sleep for forever now!
